snippet.title: The Forgotten City - Official Launch Date Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
A new trailer for the upcoming murder mystery game The Forgotten City (inspired by an award-winning Skyrim mod) confirmed a launch date of July 28 for Steam alongside a Digital Collector's Edition.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
